sentences.sContent: And then we went to Munich.
She urgently phones her contact, and he orders her to go to Munich and remain untraceable.
sentences.sContent_eng: She urgently phones her contact, and he orders her to go to Munich and remain untraceable.
sentences.sCn: 她急切地打电话给她的联络人，对方指令她前往慕尼黑，并保持不被他人找到。

phrases.pCn: 拜仁慕尼黑（德国足球队）
